class.name: com.shopping.pojo.Cart
class.select: select * from t_cart where memberId=#{memberId} and goodsId=#{goodsId};
class.update: update t_cart set number=number+1 where memberId=#{memberId} and goodsId=#{goodsId};
update t_cart set number=number+1 where id=#{id};
update t_cart set number=number-1 where id=#{id};
